entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Igloolik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:10 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -42.9°C

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 37.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 37. Wind chill minus 55 this morning and minus 48 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
